Thanx for your defense Dr Science. Most appreciated. Yes, I am still learning about the scene. And am grateful to whoever puts up worthwhile copies of films. In fact, eventually I want to upload titles myself.
Anyway back to the movie.
A:9
V:9
It took about 6 hours to download. Mustn't grumble.

I did know that IMAGINE was not part of the title, but I was going on the fact it says uploaded by TV Team. 
As for mscollins, a bit of helpful advice would have been better than trying to belittle me for no knowing. You must have been learning once.
Am seeding for a week too.

Great TS, thanks.
Was pleasantly surprised that "Imagine" didn't insert that gay fucking audio of their name into this release, at least I didn't catch it if they did.

Had a couple people walking in front of the screen but overall was a great copy for a TS.

Thought that this movie would be totally crap, but was really surprised by it. Definately worth the DL.

I downloaded this file and it worked out great, good cam! Best movie ive seen in a long time too, that shit was hilarious! Good sound too...
A 8
V 8
V: Horrible de-interlacing. Every motion is jerky and blurry, borderline unwatchable.

Good movie, good quality cam, somewhat dark.  Few stand-ups in front of the cam here and there.. thanks!

a/7
v/8
...its a good cam...
the added color helped, but the quality seems to get worse later on in the movie, and the sound goes out of sync. Great movie though. I've seen better cams, but it's free.

If I could amend my previous ratings.
A:7
V:7.5
I must apologize for that, I had only skimmed through the odd moment here and there. Now I know better. 
Once again, sorry and thanx. Still one of the best copies out there I have seen so far.

@ leetality

yes you do have to be an uber nerd to know that.  of course "IMAGINE" is not a part of the title, but to instantly infer that "IMAGINE" is the team that did this fine work is not something that most people would do.  people on TPB name their stuff the stupidest things sometimes.

I've seen kids shows with "Gayfag" and "cockrocket" after their name here on TPB in years past... am I am guessing that was not the name of the upload team... I could be wrong though.  hell a couple of years ago I saw an episode of spongebob here on TPB that after you opened the folder the AVI itself was named "Homoshow".

I know what people are going to say, that in the description it says an Imagine Realease. and fine guys, I get it. I know whats going on.  I'm just trying to defend the learners and and newcomers to TPB.

so don't be like comic book guy and cut these people a break for asking a question that seems obvious to you, remember that there is no such thing as a stupid question if you don't know the answer.

so lets hear all the the witty retorts from the peanut gallery now........
P.S.  I myself am a nerd.  I know all about how TvTeam's uploads work.  For the record I just want people to ease of the newcomers or people asking basic questions.
